tooltip.beautify.tooltip.plantlist: Hold CTRL for a list of plants
tooltip.beautify.trellis.tooltip.info: Can be placed on or like walls and on the ceiling. Climbable. Right click with plants to insert.
tooltip.beautify.trellis.tooltip.plants: Rose Bushes, Sunflowers, Peonies, Lilacs, Vines, Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, Glow Lichen.
tooltip.beautify.hanging_pot.tooltip.inf: Can be placed hanging on blocks, Ropes or on ground as usual. Right click with plants to pot them. Right click with Bone Meal to duplicate plant with 1/3 chance.
tooltip.beautify.hanging_pot.tooltip.pla: All normal flowers + Rose Bushes, Lilacs, Peonies, Sunflowers, Vines, Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, Glow Lichen, Glow Berries, Sweet Berries.
tooltip.beautify.bookstack.tooltip: Places random Bookstack. Shift-Rightclick on block to change model. Increases Enchantment Table power like shelves.
tooltip.beautify.lamp.info: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns. Rightclick to turn on/off.
tooltip.beautify.candelabra.info: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns. Rightclick with hand to turn off. Rightclick with Flint and Steel to turn on.
tooltip.beautify.lamp_jar.info: Can be placed hanging and standing like Lanterns. Rightclick with Glowstone Dust to fill. Rightclick with hand to empty.
tooltip.blinds.tooltip.info: Rightclick on Block to open or close blind and adjacent ones. After closing 1st time, blinds below topmost blind become invisible when open.
tooltip.beautify.picture_frame.tooltip.i: Places Frame with a random motive. Shift-Rightclick on Block to change model.
tooltip.beautify.rope.tooltip.info: Placable like chains and climbable. Nice addition to Hanging Pots.Nice addition to Hanging Pots.
